entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:22 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:22 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
